title: I need LCS Box Scores ; Need a summary of the week's games
body:
tl;dr; I would love to have a quick susinct  summary of the box scores of the week; not unlike the baseball or basketball scores.

Since NBA LCS moved to a best of 3 format for the summer, I can't possibly watch all of the games much less keep up with what's going on in other regions.  Box scores would help me decide which games I should go back and watch.  I'm generally ok with spoilers, so long as I can pick out the game that's worth watching.

Thoughts?

TeeHax

replies.body:
Hey TeeHax,

Would an endgame scoreboard and match history page work?  Check out the schedule page for past weeks - I think you'll find what you're looking for there.  For example: http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/na-lcs/na_2016_summer/schedule/regular_season/7

You'll be able to see the match results on the schedule page.  Clicking through to an [individual match page](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/na-lcs/na_2016_summer/matches/regular_season/IMT-vs-CLG) will show you the vod.  The big button at the bottom that says "[View Player Builds & Game Analysis](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/TRLH1/1001780152?gameHash=ae360307684b4903&tab=overview)" will show the Detailed Match History page, complete with endgame scoreboard.
